Description:
Detects cobalt strike malleable profiles patterns (URI, User-Agents, Methods).

Author: Markus Neis, Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - CobaltStrike Malleable Profile Patterns - Proxy
Query: eql select * from _source_ where (((cs-method = 'get' and c-uri like '%\?manifest=wac' and cs-host = 'onedrive.live.com') or (c-useragent = 'mozilla/5.0 (windows nt 6.1; wow64; trident/7.0; rv:11.0) like gecko' and cs-method = 'get' and c-uri = '/s/ref=nb_sb_noss_1/167-3294888-0262949/field-keywords=books' and cs-host = 'www.amazon.com' and cs-cookie like '%=csm-hit=s-24ku11bb82rzsygj3bdk|1419899012996') or (c-useragent = 'mozilla/5.0 (windows nt 6.1; wow64; trident/7.0; rv:11.0) like gecko' and cs-method = 'post' and c-uri = '/n4215/adj/amzn.us.sr.aps' and cs-host = 'www.amazon.com') or (c-useragent = 'mozilla/4.0 (compatible; msie 6.0;windows nt 5.1)' or c-useragent = 'mozilla/4.0 (compatible; msie 7.0; windows nt 6.1; wow64; trident/4.0; slcc2; .net clr 3.0.30729; .net4.0c; .net4.0e )' or c-useragent = 'mozilla/5.0 (windows; u; msie 7.0; windows nt 5.2) java/1.5.0_08') or c-useragent like '%; manm; manm)' or (c-uri like '%/oscp/%' and cs-host = 'ocsp.verisign.com')) and  not (c-uri like 'http%' and c-uri like '%://onedrive.live.com/%'))
